context_bundle.summary: Future project: Background agent messaging without screen takeover. Replace AHK direct injection with Carbyne TCP or file-based IPC. KALIC polls/watches, DC writes - no focus steal.

onboarding.quick_start: FUTURE GOAL: Replace AHK screen takeover with background messaging. DC writes via Carbyne or file, KALIC polls/watches, no focus steal. Infrastructure exists (Carbyne TCP 7777), needs wiring.
common_patterns: DC writes to Carbyne/file -> KALIC polls/watches -> no screen takeover
Replace AHK focus-steal with TCP/file-based IPC
Carbyne daemon already on TCP 7777 - extend for bidirectional
